title: 'Kangaroo' with 'two joeys in tow' on the loose in Nottingham
text:
Get the biggest daily news stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

A kangaroo is on the loose in Nottingham after it was photographed in a park near the city centre.

In a post on Facebook, the local police team, said: "G'day Bulwell, this picture was taken this morning in Bulwell, I think you're thinking what I'm thinking and I think we might be right mate.

"There's a kangaroo in Bulwell and we believe she has two joeys in tow.

"They were seen hopping around on the old pit site this morning.

"So if you see Red, Skippy or Joey bouncing around near you give us a ring."

They added: "We’ve looked into this report and nothing’s jumping out at us - but if you see anything out back, hop to it and let us know!"

The Facebook post was uploaded on Thursday and has been shared over a thousand times by users

We'll be bringing you the very latest updates, pictures and video on this breaking news story.
description: Local police uploaded an image to Facebook which has since been shared over a thousand times by users
